Package com.berbils.game.Screens

Class TitleScreen

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.berbils.game.Screens.TitleScreen
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    com.badlogic.gdx.Screen
    public class TitleScreen
extends java.lang.Object
implements com.badlogic.gdx.Screen
    Creates a title screen which consists of a single large texture in the middle of the screen. Has the ability to display indefinitely or update onto a different screen after a set amount of time

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      TitleScreen​(com.badlogic.gdx.Game game, com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.g2d.SpriteBatch spriteBatch, java.lang.String titlePath)
      Creates the viewport,stage and calculates padding value.Also calculates the title position and size

      This methods creates a timer that allows the screen to only display for a set amount of time before changing to a different once
      void show()

        Parameters:
        game - The game instance
        spriteBatch - spriteBatch to be drawn to
        titlePath - The file path to the texture for the title that will be displaed

      • setTimer

        public void setTimer​(float timeToShow,
                     com.badlogic.gdx.Screen toChangeTo)
        This methods creates a timer that allows the screen to only display for a set amount of time before changing to a different once
        Parameters:
        timeToShow - how long in seconds the screen will be displayed for
        toChangeTo - The screen that will be displaed to the user after the length of time determined by timeToShow
